yaak.model.service
Interface ServiceListener

public interface ServiceListener

ServiceListener allows agents to register with an arena to provide services.

Version:
$Id: ServiceListener.java 13 2006-02-12 18:30:51Z jsmith $
Author:
Jerry Smith

Method Detail

getService

public Service getService()

Provides the contract service.

Returns:
The object implementing contracted service.

getServiceType

public java.lang.Class getServiceType()

Identifies the contract service.

Returns:
The Class object identifying the service.

getServiceTypeAsString

public java.lang.String getServiceTypeAsString()

Identifies the contract service.

Returns:
The string identifying the service's interface.

performService

public java.lang.Object performService(ServiceNotification notification)

Implements the registered service provided by the agent.

Parameters:
notification - The notification object generated by the service arena.
Returns:
The arbitrary result object.

performService

public java.lang.Object performService(Service service,
                                       ServiceNotification notification)

Handles, if possible, the requested service. The service arena will identify the requested service, as well as provide the standard notification data.

Parameters:
service - The requested service.
notification - The notification object generated by the service arena.
Returns:
The arbitrary result object.

canDo

public boolean canDo(Service service)

Indicates whether or not the agent is equipped to provide the specified service. An agent may agree to perform a service other than the registered service.

Parameters:
service - The requested service.
Returns:
The agents willingness to initiate the service request.
